'''Beta 1.21.50.29''' (ChromeOS, Android) or '''Preview 1.21.50.29''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox, PlayStation) is the seventh and final beta version and sixth ''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.50]], released on November 13, 2024,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/31854896895629-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-50-29|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.50.29|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=November 13, 2024}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Chiseled Resin Bricks]]'''
*Addressed a single-pixel inconsistency between the textures of chiseled resin bricks and standard resin bricks.

'''[[Creaking Heart]]'''
*Increased the base amount of time it takes to destroy a creaking heart with no tool to 15 seconds.

=== General ===
'''UI'''
*Using the scroll wheel when hovering a [[bundle]] placed in hotbar with creative inventory search tab active now selects an item in the bundle.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.50.29 Preview
|;previous
|188200|Nether Bricks & Red Nether Bricks remain not aligned to Bricks blocks
|otherissuescount=2}}
'''Other'''
*Resolves an Android (Adreno only) specific stall that can occur at high frame rates.
*Fixed glow lichen playing the grass sound when stepped on instead of the vine sound like Java.</onlyinclude>
